document_data.mainbody:
The Sunreacher was one of the four elven wardragons in Evermeets navy.The wardragon ship type is described as being magically propelled with no sails, though the Sunreacher is drawn in Elves of Evermeet on the map of Ruith as having a sail.
The Sunreacher spent some time in the 14 century DR anchored at the habor of Ruith.
